titles.title: Native Hawaiian Medicaid Coverage Act of 2007

A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide 100 percent reimbursement for medical assistance provided to a Native Hawaiian through a federally-qualified health center or a Native Hawaiian health care system.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S115)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Native Hawaiian Medicaid Coverage Act of 2007 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide full reimbursement for medical assistance given to a Native Hawaiian through a federally-qualified health center or a Native Hawaiian health care system.
